author: James Charles
quote: I'm having fun. I'm being myself. I'm doing what I love. That's all that matters.

author: Simone Biles
quote: At the end of the day, if I can say I had fun, it was a good day.

author: Michael Jordan
quote: Just play. Have fun. Enjoy the game.

author: Jonathan Sacks
quote: Make space in your life for the things that matter, for family and friends, love and generosity, fun and joy. Without this, you will burn out in mid-career and wonder where your life went.

author: Walt Disney
quote: It's kind of fun to do the impossible.

author: Rekha
quote: The bottom line is to have fun and enjoy life.

author: Dale Carnegie
quote: People rarely succeed unless they have fun in what they are doing.

author: Dr. Seuss
quote: Today was good. Today was fun. Tomorrow is another one.

author: Joe Namath
quote: When you have confidence, you can have a lot of fun. And when you have fun, you can do amazing things.

author: Charles R. Swindoll
quote: I cannot even imagine where I would be today were it not for that handful of friends who have given me a heart full of joy. Let's face it, friends make life a lot more fun.

author: Sally Ride
quote: Science is fun. Science is curiosity. We all have natural curiosity. Science is a process of investigating. It's posing questions and coming up with a method. It's delving in.

author: Lonnie Johnson
quote: I love playing around with ideas and turning them into something useful or fun.

author: Jackie Robinson
quote: This ain't fun. But you watch me, I'll get it done.

author: Raini Rodriguez
quote: Bullying is never fun, it's a cruel and terrible thing to do to someone. If you are being bullied, it is not your fault. No one deserves to be bullied, ever.

author: Katharine Hepburn
quote: If you obey all the rules you miss all the fun.

author: Ricky Gervais
quote: I think you can make fun of anything except things people can't help. They can't help their race or their sex or their age, so you ridicule their pretension or their ego instead. You can ridicule ideas - ideas don't have feelings. You can ridicule an idea that someone holds without hurting them.

author: Christopher Parker
quote: Procrastination is like a credit card: it's a lot of fun until you get the bill.

author: J-Hope
quote: Do what you want to try doing. Take whatever you get out of it and have fun.

author: A. A. Milne
quote: It is more fun to talk with someone who doesn't use long, difficult words but rather short, easy words, like 'What about lunch?'

author: LL Cool J
quote: Dreams don't have deadlines. I'm thinking of doing bigger and better things and having more fun with it.

author: Paul Walker
quote: My philosophy is: If you can't have fun, there's no sense in doing it.

author: Pat Summitt
quote: Winning is fun... Sure. But winning is not the point. Wanting to win is the point. Not giving up is the point. Never letting up is the point. Never being satisfied with what you've done is the point.

author: Tyler, The Creator
quote: I'm a pretty nice dude. I have fun, and people take it the wrong way.

author: Betty White
quote: I just make it my business to get along with people so I can have fun. It's that simple.

author: James Hetfield
quote: It's all fun and games 'till someone loses an eye, then it's just fun you can't see.

author: Amelia Earhart
quote: Flying might not be all plain sailing, but the fun of it is worth the price.

author: Andrew Jackson
quote: There is no pleasure in having nothing to do; the fun is having lots to do and not doing it.

author: Lindsey Vonn
quote: If you go around being afraid, you're never going to enjoy life. You have only one chance, so you've got to have fun.

author: Ian McShane
quote: The bad boy: always more fun.

author: Twiggy
quote: There's no need to dress like everyone else. It's much more fun to create your own look.

author: Lil Baby
quote: I just save my money, man. I don't even try to enjoy it like these other rappers; they having fun and they lit, but they gon' be broke later on. I be savin', I be chillin'. It feels good to know I got it, but it feel better to know I'ma keep it too.

author: Demetri Martin
quote: Swimming is a confusing sport, because sometimes you do it for fun, and other times you do it to not die. And when I'm swimming, sometimes I'm not sure which one it is.

author: Coolio
quote: Life is too short to not have fun; we are only here for a short time compared to the sun and the moon and all that.

author: Thomas A. Edison
quote: I never did a day's work in my life. It was all fun.

author: Randy Pausch
quote: Never, ever underestimate the importance of having fun.

author: Jean Chatzky
quote: While you're going through this process of trying to find the satisfaction in your work, pretend you feel satisfied. Tell yourself you had a good day. Walk through the corridors with a smile rather than a scowl. Your positive energy will radiate. If you act like you're having fun, you'll find you are having fun.

author: Priyanka Chopra
quote: I think it's great to be flawed. I am hugely flawed, and I like it this way. That's the fun of life. You fall, get up, make mistakes, learn from them, be human and be you.

author: Yungblud
quote: My personality is energetic, fun, yet slightly psychotic.

author: Phillipa Soo
quote: I've prioritized taking care of my mind, having fun, and doing things that make me laugh. And eating well - as in, really good food, like steak or pasta or fresh vegetables or an amazing dessert. You know, 'treat yo'self.'

author: Hunter S. Thompson
quote: There are many harsh lessons to be learned from the gambling experience, but the harshest one of all is the difference between having Fun and being Smart.

author: Dane Cook
quote: When people refer to 'Back in the Day,' it was a Wednesday. Just a little fun fact for you.

author: Jordana Brewster
quote: People spend so much time in their cars, and it's a legal way to have fun by speeding a little bit or testing yourself a little bit, and you get to invest in your car. For some people, it becomes their baby.

author: Debbie Meyer
quote: Believe in yourself, not only in swimming, but in life itself. You always have to have fun. You have to have an open mind. If you're not enjoying it, don't do it. Life's too short.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I want to get a vending machine, with fun sized candy bars, and the glass in front is a magnifying glass. You'll be mad, but it will be too late.

author: Andrew Breitbart
quote: I love fighting for what I believe in. I love having fun while doing it.

author: Bob Hope
quote: If you watch a game, it's fun. If you play it, it's recreation. If you work at it, it's golf.

author: Dave Grohl
quote: If there's one thing I'm good at, it's gathering people together to do something fun.

author: William Glasser
quote: We are driven by five genetic needs: survival, love and belonging, power, freedom, and fun.

author: Liu Wen
quote: A fun pair of earrings is basically the finishing touch to any outfit; a nice watch is both practical and decorative, while the perfect unique bag is not only eye-catching but also timeless - it can be passed on to future generations.

author: Ernest Hemingway
quote: I love to go to the zoo. But not on Sunday. I don't like to see the people making fun of the animals, when it should be the other way around.

author: Nina Dobrev
quote: Even though you're growing up, you should never stop having fun.

author: John McEnroe
quote: The important thing is to learn a lesson every time you lose. Life is a learning process and you have to try to learn what's best for you. Let me tell you, life is not fun when you're banging your head against a brick wall all the time.

author: John Lasseter
quote: People want to be creatively satisfied, and having fun is such an important part of that.

author: Leo Burnett
quote: Make it simple. Make it memorable. Make it inviting to look at. Make it fun to read.

author: Quentin Tarantino
quote: Violence is one of the most fun things to watch.

author: Markus Persson
quote: I think the only way I could make something fun and big is if I don't expect it to be.

author: Anthony Hopkins
quote: I think the healthy way to live is to make friends with the beast inside oneself, and that means not the beast but the shadow. The dark side of one's nature. Have fun with it and you know, is to accept everything about ourselves.

author: Sean Kingston
quote: I make sure I always surround myself with good, down to earth, fun, real people, who always keep me grounded.

author: Frank Ocean
quote: You just do what you can and you have as much fun as possible.

author: Kirsten Dunst
quote: You can never control who you fall in love with, even when you're in the most sad, confused time of your life. You don't fall in love with people because they're fun. It just happens.

author: Garth Brooks
quote: Just keep taking chances and having fun.

author: Michelle McCool
quote: Don't give in to bullying or others making fun of people. Stand up for yourself. Stand up for your friends. Be that one person who is genuinely good-hearted.

author: Christopher Meloni
quote: You can be childlike without being childish. A child always wants to have fun. Ask yourself, 'Am I having fun?'

author: Bipasha Basu
quote: I have always believed that if you need to take your clothes off to get your man, you've begun to lose the battle. If you pull it off right, you can do it in a very classy way... Being sexy is about suggestion; it's about the tease. It's not about being obvious and forcing yourself out in the open. That takes all the fun out of being a woman.

author: Mickey Rourke
quote: It's no fun being a loser. Trust me.

author: Amanda Peet
quote: Beauty is only skin deep. If you go after someone just because she's beautiful but don't have anything to talk about, it's going to get boring fast. You want to look beyond the surface and see if you can have fun or if you have anything in common with this person.

author: Paula Abdul
quote: Find fitness with fun dancing. It is fun and makes you forget about the dreaded exercise.

author: Mollie King
quote: 'Sexy' is being independent, being confident and having fun.

author: Jimmy Buffett
quote: Searching is half the fun: life is much more manageable when thought of as a scavenger hunt as opposed to a surprise party.

author: Jamie Foxx
quote: I went to college on a classical piano scholarship. My grandmother made me practice one full hour a day. Every day. Man. I thought all she wanted was for me not to have any fun. Next thing you know, you have a career in music. Now, not everybody's going to go on and be Mozart or Michael Jackson. But music makes you smarter.

author: Noel Coward
quote: Work is much more fun than fun.

author: Chris Brown
quote: Follow your dreams. Just make sure to have fun too.

author: Satoru Iwata
quote: Video games are meant to be just one thing: Fun! Fun for everyone.

author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
quote: It is fun to be in the same decade with you.

author: Keanu Reeves
quote: It's fun to be hopelessly in love. It's dangerous, but it's fun.

author: Heath Ledger
quote: I only do this because I'm having fun. The day I stop having fun, I'll just walk away.

author: Jerry Seinfeld
quote: There is no such thing as fun for the whole family.

author: Tupac Shakur
quote: It's the game of life. Do I win or do I lose? One day they're gonna shut the game down. I gotta have as much fun and go around the board as many times as I can before it's my turn to leave.

author: Kevyn Aucoin
quote: Beauty is about perception, not about make-up. I think the beginning of all beauty is knowing and liking oneself. You can't put on make-up, or dress yourself, or do you hair with any sort of fun or joy if you're doing it from a position of correction.

author: Will Thomas
quote: There's no fear when you're having fun.

author: Lin-Manuel Miranda
quote: The fun for me in collaboration is, one, working with other people just makes you smarter; that's proven.

author: Suzanne Weyn
quote: Perfect happiness would be knowing that all my family and friends were happy and safe. Then I'd go to a tropical island with my husband where it was gorgeous and fun all day long and interesting and fun all evening. Good food and dancing would be nice, too, and weekly visits from those safe and happy family and friends. Plus world peace.

author: Bridgit Mendler
quote: In terms of fashion, I love adding a fun scarf to whatever I'm wearing - it's a great way to dress up a plain outfit!

author: Laetitia Casta
quote: It's always fun to immerse yourself in a different time period.

author: Pulkit Samrat
quote: Though I am a shy person at heart, I explode as a volcano once I open up with people around me, and then I am all fun.

author: Joe Perry
quote: Take life on life's terms - one day at a time. And have fun while you're doing it.

author: Babe Ruth
quote: I'll promise to go easier on drinking and to get to bed earlier, but not for you, fifty thousand dollars, or two-hundred and fifty thousand dollars will I give up women. They're too much fun.

author: Amy Lee
quote: If people are making fun of you then you're probably doing something right.

author: Hattie McDaniel
quote: Putting a little time aside for clean fun and good humor is very necessary to relieve the tensions of our time.

author: Katharine Graham
quote: To love what you do and feel that it matters how could anything be more fun?

author: Anne Wilson Schaef
quote: I realize that humor isn't for everyone. It's only for people who want to have fun, enjoy life, and feel alive.

author: Joseph Epstein
quote: Of the seven deadly sins, only envy is no fun at all.

author: Kalpana Chawla
quote: You must enjoy the journey because whether or not you get there, you must have fun on the way.

author: Brian May
quote: Astronomy's much more fun when you're not an astronomer.

author: Lenny Kravitz
quote: People see my photos and think I labor over my image and I'm this cool, brooding artist. But I'm just having fun with it.

author: Brit Morin
quote: To me, age doesn't make a difference in terms of how playful or fun life can be.

author: Mary Karr
quote: When I got sober, I thought giving up was saying goodbye to all the fun and all the sparkle, and it turned out to be just the opposite. That's when the sparkle started for me.

author: Linus Torvalds
quote: Most good programmers do programming not because they expect to get paid or get adulation by the public, but because it is fun to program.

author: Doja Cat
quote: I just like to do the fun stuff. If I'm not having fun with it, I'm not going to do it for the rest of my life.

author: Taylor Kinney
quote: I'm a country boy. I grew up kicking around the woods, riding dirt bikes, playing football, climbing rocks and all that good stuff, so that's always been fun.

author: Hideo Kojima
quote: Games shouldn't only be fun. They should teach or spark an interest in other things.

author: Nas
quote: I want to have fun. It's a beautiful life. You learn, you win, you lose, but you get up.

author: Erica Jong
quote: Jealousy is all the fun you think they had.

author: Tim Howard
quote: Winning is fun, but those moments that you can touch someone's life in a very positive way are better.

author: Richard Branson
quote: Fun is one of the most important - and underrated - ingredients in any successful venture. If you're not having fun, then it's probably time to call it quits and try something else.

author: Sue Perkins
quote: I always want to have fun and be silly and be childish. I'm very childish. I am at my happiest when I am a child and I am just playing.

author: Daniel J. Boorstin
quote: Technology is so much fun but we can drown in our technology. The fog of information can drive out knowledge.

author: Diane Kruger
quote: It's fun being one of the boys. It's fun to have a character that's rough and gets down and dirty and not to be this precious girl who just sits in the corner and just sort of stands by the action.

author: Billy Joel
quote: I'd rather laugh with the sinners than cry with the saints - the sinners are much more fun.

author: Jidenna
quote: A classic man is a distinguished man. He cares about taste and his craft. He's all about the simple model that I live by - eat, drink, be swanky, and have fun getting the job done. He makes sure that he's excellent in all things and that he cares about his neighborhood immensely.

author: Zac Efron
quote: I don't know if I believe in love at first sight, but of course I believe in two people having chemistry right away. A girl should be really easy to talk to. When I lose track of time because we've been talking, I think that's really fun.

author: Craig Sager
quote: I will live my life full of love and full of fun. It's the only way I know how.

author: Bum Phillips
quote: Winning is only half of it. Having fun is the other half.

author: Barry Gibb
quote: As long as you're having fun, that's the key. The moment it becomes a grind, it's over.

author: Mekhi Phifer
quote: I've gotten to travel all over the world and meet all kinds of people and do all kinds of great things, so it's, like, surreal. It just lets you know how time flies, especially when you're having fun. It seems like time keeps going by faster as I get older.

author: John Muir
quote: Any fool can destroy trees. They cannot run away; and if they could, they would still be destroyed - chased and hunted down as long as fun or a dollar could be got out of their bark hides, branching horns, or magnificent bole backbones.

author: Cristiano Ronaldo
quote: I'm proud to play for Real Madrid because I have fun; when you no longer have fun it's a sign that it's time to leave. For now though, I'm happy here at the greatest club in the world.

author: Ray Bradbury
quote: The great fun in my life has been getting up every morning and rushing to the typewriter because some new idea has hit me.

author: Woody Allen
quote: Most of the time I don't have much fun. The rest of the time I don't have any fun at all.

author: Celia Imrie
quote: A 'naughty pickle' is how I'd best describe myself. I think fun and laughter is the whole point of life.

author: Robert A. Heinlein
quote: Don't ever become a pessimist... a pessimist is correct oftener than an optimist, but an optimist has more fun, and neither can stop the march of events.

author: Dave Barry
quote: Skiing combines outdoor fun with knocking down trees with your face.

author: Tony Gwynn
quote: Remember these two things: play hard and have fun.

author: Sameera Reddy
quote: Baking is fun! I find it very therapeutic, a stress buster.

author: George Orwell
quote: Most people get a fair amount of fun out of their lives, but on balance life is suffering, and only the very young or the very foolish imagine otherwise.

author: Phylicia Rashad
quote: If I had known being insane was so much fun, I'd have gone crazy long ago.

author: Tiger Woods
quote: Don't force your kids into sports. I never was. To this day, my dad has never asked me to go play golf. I ask him. It's the child's desire to play that matters, not the parent's desire to have the child play. Fun. Keep it fun.

author: Prince Harry
quote: You've got to have fun in life. Otherwise, wow - imagine life without fun.

author: Chuck Feeney
quote: I believe strongly in 'giving while living.' I see little reason to delay giving when so much good can be achieved through supporting worthwhile causes today. Besides, it's a lot more fun to give while you live than to give while you are dead.

author: Robin Williams
quote: The 'Aladdin' thing - that's not work; that's just fun. Three days in the recording studio going mad, then the animators do all the work. Not a bad way to cash a large check, my friend.

author: Flip Wilson
quote: Get well cards have become so humorous that if you don't get sick you're missing half the fun.

author: SZA
quote: I make bad decisions frequently. They're fun.

author: Patrick Lencioni
quote: Life is full of surprises: new opportunities come up; that's part of the fun - the adventure of life. The thing is, chaos doesn't allow us to enjoy the adventure.

author: Nyjah Huston
quote: That is the most fun part of skateboarding, the challenges. There are always new possibilities.

author: Dave Mustaine
quote: The Bible and several other self help or enlightenment books cite the Seven Deadly Sins. They are: pride, greed, lust, envy, wrath, sloth, and gluttony. That pretty much covers everything that we do, that is sinful... or fun for that matter.

author: Tom Brady
quote: So many guys are so conservative with their hair, and I always joke with all my buddies when they mess with me, and I'll say, 'That's right, keep the same haircut for ten years.' How fun is that?

author: Philip Treacy
quote: Wearing a hat is fun; people have a good time when they're wearing a hat.

author: Robert Baden-Powell
quote: My belief is that we were put into this world of wonders and beauty with a special ability to appreciate them, in some cases to have the fun of taking a hand in developing them, and also in being able to help other people instead of overreaching them and, through it all, to enjoy life - that is, to be happy.

author: Herodotus
quote: If a man insisted always on being serious, and never allowed himself a bit of fun and relaxation, he would go mad or become unstable without knowing it.

author: Clint Eastwood
quote: Aging can be fun if you lay back and enjoy it.

author: Elliott Erwitt
quote: I appreciate simplicity, true beauty that lasts over time, and a little wit and eclecticism that make life more fun.

author: Keke Palmer
quote: I think people should have fun. And don't get so down on yourself. Enjoy life and be the best person you can be.

author: Jocko Willink
quote: It's not fun to get out of bed early in the morning. When the alarm goes off, it doesn't sing you a song: it hits you in the head with a baseball bat. So how do you respond to that? Do you crawl underneath your covers and hide? Or do you get up, get aggressive, and attack the day?

author: Dean Ornish
quote: One of the reasons I'm excited by what visionary Elon Musk has done with the Tesla is to show that you can reduce global warming and drive a powerful, fun car. A cool car helps make a cooler planet.

author: Katie Holmes
quote: It's kind of fun being the cute, little one. In fact, I'm finding it hard to grow out of that.

author: Kara Walker
quote: It feels like a game, this work I do. It is totally heartfelt, and I love the sticky terrain, the straight-up cartoons, how the irrepressible and icky rise to the surface. But I am not just trying to call forth bugaboos and demons for the sake of it, for fun.

author: Tommy Shaw
quote: You can have fun, but you also have to put on your thinking cap every day.

author: Paris Hilton
quote: I get half a million just to show up at parties. My life is, like, really, really fun.

author: Matthew Mercer
quote: Time and time again, the players constantly surprise you and often not do at all what you expect and completely muck up your preparation, and that's kind of the beauty of the game. It wouldn't be as fun to the DM if everything worked out exactly how you thought it would.

author: DeMar DeRozan
quote: My mom always told me: Never make fun of anybody, because you never know what that person is going through. Ever since I was a kid, I never did. I never did.

author: Bono
quote: As a rock star, I have two instincts, I want to have fun, and I want to change the world. I have a chance to do both.

author: Rihanna
quote: I want to give people a taste of the Caribbean, and show them the fun side of me.

author: Shaun White
quote: Skateboarding is training, but I don't think of it as training. It's fun.

author: Connor McDavid
quote: It's more fun to be playing hockey than doing anything else.

author: Sandra Bullock
quote: Poop humor is fun. If you do the toilet scenes well and commit to them, they can be really, really powerful.

author: Kim Kardashian
quote: I think it would be so much fun to be in the White House.

author: Brie Bella
quote: It's not even about looking good; it's about feeling good inside. Celebrity Sweat makes everyone aware of that but in a fun way with their favorite athletes.

author: David Bowie
quote: I feel confident imposing change on myself. It's a lot more fun progressing than looking back. That's why I need to throw curve balls.

author: Choi Si-won
quote: People know me as just this handsome guy - a very handsome guy. But I can also be funny and fun.

author: Chuck Palahniuk
quote: If you knew that your life was merely a phase or short, short segment of your entire existence, how would you live? Knowing nothing 'real' was at risk, what would you do? You'd live a gigantic, bold, fun, dazzling life. You know you would. That's what the ghosts want us to do - all the exciting things they no longer can.

author: Daniel Levitin
quote: When you're at work, be fully at work. And let your leisure time be what it's meant to be - restorative and fun.

author: Magnus Carlsen
quote: I spend hours playing chess because I find it so much fun. The day it stops being fun is the day I give up.

author: Evan Peters
quote: I'm goofy. I'm silly. I like to have fun.

author: MF Doom
quote: Being older now, grown, I'm like, 'What do we really do that's fun?' I'm kind of corny when you think about it. What could I rhyme about? Let me see, um, I gotta pay the rent today.

author: Terry Pratchett
quote: Writing is the most fun you can have by yourself.

author: Jesse Plemons
quote: I did a Coca-Cola commercial when I was about two and a half years old, and then me and my family were extras in a bunch of Westerns. I loved dressing up and stepping into this imaginary world, and it was fun to get outside of my tiny little town with a bunch of movie weirdos.

author: Cazzie David
quote: It's so funny how social media was just this fun thing, and now it's this monster that consumes so many millennial lives.

author: Kaetlyn Osmond
quote: To pursue anything, you've got to have fun with it and to just never give up on it.

author: Jewel
quote: Love bravely, live bravely, be courageous, there's really nothing to lose. There's no wrong you can't make right again, so be kinder to yourself, you know, have fun, take chances. There's no bounds.

author: Brian Wilson
quote: Summer means happy times and good sunshine. It means going to the beach, going to Disneyland, having fun.

author: Kyle Gass
quote: It's always fun to play the hometown.

author: Rick Riordan
quote: My goal in the classroom was always to make sure they were having so much fun that they didn't realize they were learning.

author: Leo Buscaglia
quote: Food is celebratory. People who don't cook don't know how much fun they're missing.

author: Ariana Grande
quote: I always knew that St. Jude was an amazing organization but meeting the kids and seeing how the hospital works first hand was truly beautiful. It doesn't feel like a regular hospital all dreary and sad. It's a colorful, beautiful, comfortable, fun place to live and the energy is wonderful.

author: Park Bo-gum
quote: I learned playing cello in 'Cantabile' and Go in 'Reply 1988.' In 'Moonlight Drawn by Clouds,' I learned horse riding and Geomungo. It's fun to learn new things.

author: Chris Tucker
quote: You don't know who you messing with man, I slap people for fun. That's what I do man! You wanna play rough, huh, I kill for fun!

author: The Undertaker
quote: I've had both my eye sockets crushed, I've been set on fire, uh, that was not fun, I've torn a pec, torn biceps.

author: Eric Dickerson
quote: I'm just not the outgoing bubble of energy. But if I know you, it's different. Practical jokes. Have fun. I'm not looking for any new friends. I got my friends.

author: Hilary Farr
quote: I happen to love creating handmade ornaments even when I mess up I still have fun.

author: James St. James
quote: The Club Kids were about fun. Wild, messy fun - the more debauched, the better.

author: Bill Murray
quote: I realized the more fun I had, the more relaxed I was working, the better I worked.

author: Kin Hubbard
quote: Fun is like life insurance; the older you get, the more it costs.

author: Sturgill Simpson
quote: I worked for Union Pacific. I started out as a conductor at an intermodal switching facility outside of Salt Lake City. We'd pull in trains from all over the country, break them apart, consolidate the freight, and build other trains. It was great until I screwed up and took a management position. Then it became no fun very quickly.

author: Dan Bilzerian
quote: Climbing the mountain is always more fun than sitting at the top. It's just you have to find different mountains to climb.

author: Karl-Anthony Towns
quote: All those teams I was on that were successful were the ones that everyone had love for each other and had fun. Things that seem minuscule - joking around, laughing, conversing, all those things that seem childish - that is what builds camaraderie.

author: Antonio Brown
quote: In a competition, there's always winners and losers. And I think everyone is here to win, which makes it fun for us all.

author: Tom Segura
quote: I don't want to lose weight to live long or be healthy. I just want to be able to make fun of fat people again and know for sure that they're fatter than me.

author: Ciara
quote: Whatever you do, have fun while doing it. That's important for me.

author: Roman Reigns
quote: Don't worry about the pressure or the responsibility. Just live in it, have fun, and when everything seems to be going right, just stay humble and remember your family.

author: Vanessa Hudgens
quote: So many people try to grow up too fast, and it's not fun! You should stay a kid as long as possible!

author: Steve Prefontaine
quote: Every once in a while I think, 'What am I doing out here running, busting myself up? Life could be so much easier. The other guys are out having fun, doing other things, why not me?'

author: Tara Westover
quote: Not knowing my birthday had never seemed strange. I knew I'd been born near the end of September, and each year I picked a day, one that didn't fall on a Sunday because it's no fun spending your birthday in church.

author: Eileen Caddy

quote: I was an only child and I had a mother and father who were just - there wasn't a straight man in the house, and I mean that in a very nice way. They were fun, and we would laugh a lot.

author: Ginger Rogers
quote: Sure, jets are fast and economical, but, oh my, what fun we've lost and what leisure we've sacrificed in the race to efficiency. Somehow, stepping onto a plane and zooming across the United States in a matter of hours doesn't hold a candle to the dear, old-fashioned train ride.

author: Derek Jeter
quote: You're playing a game, whether it's Little League or Game 7 of the Word Series. It's impossible to do well unless you're having a good time. People talk about pressure. Yeah, there's pressure. But I just look at it as fun.

author: W. Edwards Deming
quote: The prevailing system of management has crushed fun out of the workplace.

author: Sandra Dee
quote: My first year and a half in Hollywood, I did three films. Then in 1959, I was in 'Gidget,' 'Imitation of Life' and 'A Summer Place.' After that, I was a star. It was fun.

author: Judy Norton
quote: I'm an impromptu cook. It's fun if it doesn't take too much time!

author: Tyra Banks
quote: I have a big forehead, and I got made fun of all time. When I was a little girl, they used to call me 'five-head.'

author: Marco Pierre White
quote: Rudeness is not having fun, and if it is, it's at the expense of another person.

author: Octavia E. Butler
quote: People who think about time travel stories sometimes think that going back in time would be fun because you would have all the information you needed to be much more astute than the people there, when the truth is of course you wouldn't.

author: Richard P. Feynman
quote: You're unlikely to discover something new without a lot of practice on old stuff, but further, you should get a heck of a lot of fun out of working out funny relations and interesting things.

author: Vikrant Massey
quote: 'Rise' is a fun web series but one that tackles the practical realities of our lives. It is a story that most of us experience in some or the other form, and that is what got me excited about the story.

author: Russell Baker
quote: Newspaper people, once celebrated as founts of ribald humor and uncouth fun, have of late lost all their gaiety, and small wonder.

author: Masahiro Sakurai
quote: Game development is very difficult. Nobody sets out to create a game that's not fun. It's all of the challenges and difficulties that happen throughout development that determine whether a game is a failure or a success. I think playing those thousands of games is the single best and easiest way to learn from my predecessors.

author: Roger Penrose
quote: Science and fun cannot be separated.

author: Kesha
quote: I'm really fun. I'm ridiculously fun. I hope I'm infectiously fun.

author: Hannah Murray
quote: Turns out you have a really fun time if you go to work every day and focus on being silly and funny and happy!

author: Johnny Depp
quote: I did do a film that I refer to as 'The Unpronounceable' by a guy named Yvan Attal with Charlotte Gainsbourg. I had a bit part in there. That was quite fun, doing scenes in French.

author: James Thurber
quote: The dog has got more fun out of Man than Man has got out of the dog, for the clearly demonstrable reason that Man is the more laughable of the two animals.

author: Harry Anderson
quote: It's an old Elizabethan idea. The fool is the only one who is allowed to make fun of the king because he is a fool. I can say whatever I want about anybody else because I'm just an idiot talking - I'm not insisting that I'm any smarter than anyone else. It's satire.

author: Alex Jones
quote: The globalists are smart and tell us sin is fun, sin is a red-devil cheerleader.

author: Kevin Nealon
quote: I loved working on 'Happy Gilmore' because I love to travel to new places and we got to go to British Columbia. Any Adam Sandler film is fun to work on because it is a reunion of the boys club of guys that have worked together in the past.

author: Jennifer Coolidge
quote: I live in New Orleans part of the year, and it's a really fun eating town. I bought two homes there, one to live in and one as an investment. They love to eat, drink and dress up in costumes. There are so many reasons to dress up - Mardi Gras, Halloween, Southern Decadence.

author: Alan Thicke
quote: Fitness needs to be perceived as fun and games or we subconsciously avoid it.

author: Joe Rogan
quote: Stand-up is still my favorite, but the podcast is a close second. It's so fun, and it's given me the opportunity to have three-hour conversations with people I wouldn't have otherwise been able to talk to. When I talked to Maynard Keenan from Tool, I almost couldn't believe it was happening.

author: Mike Rowe
quote: I can say the willingness to get dirty has always defined us as an nation, and it's a hallmark of hard work and a hallmark of fun, and dirt is not the enemy.

author: Val Kilmer
quote: It's the persona that makes you a leading actor. A leading actor has something extra that's fun to watch. But it isn't usually about acting.

author: Dion DiMucci
quote: I tell you, gospel music is very uplifting. It's great. It's just a lot of fun to write, and it's wonderful for the heart, soul, mind, and spirit. It's just great.

author: George Eads
quote: I have a Lab, it's fun to hang out and hike with the dog, people come up to him, and pet him, it's fun.

author: Jerry Della Femina
quote: I honestly believe that advertising is the most fun you can have with your clothes on.

author: Ernie Johnson Jr.
quote: It's fun to go to a job where you know you're going to laugh before the day is over.

author: Robert Fulghum
quote: Any fool can make enough money to survive. It's another thing to keep yourself consistently entertained. It's a lot of work, and a lot of fun, to make a life.

author: Barrett Wilbert Weed
quote: My senior year, I got to play Maureen in 'Rent,' and I had more fun than I'd ever had in my life.

author: Nani
quote: 'Pilla Zamindar' is a fun film. I enjoyed working in it.

author: Sam Allardyce
quote: The bonding of the team is exceptionally important and trying to create a good team spirit and to have some fun.

author: Patrick Carney
quote: The Midwest breeds funny, eccentric people, to varying degrees. You play shows not because you're expecting to get a record deal, but to do something fun outside of mowing lawns. Everything else is just gravy... Or mustard.

author: Wendy Williams
quote: People love to throw stones at me, and I get it. It's fun to make fun of me, because I put myself out there. I'm a large personality, and I got the funny bone; I voice my opinion, and then people get upset.

author: CC Sabathia
quote: I remember one time in my junior year, in my art class, our teacher had us doing, like, finger paints, and I went and put a stripe on a girl's shirt, and it turned into a big paint fight. Paint all over the walls, all over everybody. It was pretty fun.

author: Dylan O'Brien
quote: I just really like fun, cool, interesting, quirky girls. And sometimes you find that in 6'2 model bodies and sometimes they're short and brunette. All shapes and sizes - it's really about the personality. That sounds cliche, but it's so freaking true!

author: Syd Barrett
quote: I think young people should have a lot of fun. But I never seem to have any.

author: Greg Kinnear

author: LeToya Luckett

author: Saina Nehwal

author: Rick Nielsen
quote: Playing it safe isn't fun; you have to take a chance.

author: Jane Birkin
quote: When you start recognising that you're having fun, life can be delightful.

author: Robson Green

author: Inbar Lavi

author: Steve Garvey

author: Donatella Versace

author: Christina Aguilera

author: Armistead Maupin

author: Lucy Punch
quote: People ask why I always play crazy people and free spirits. I guess it is because I like to have fun. But I am more ambitious than your average free spirit. This job is hard enough that, without drive and hard work, you will never make it work.

author: Rajiv Ouseph

author: Yoko Ono

author: Gary Cherone

author: Ron Francis
quote: It was a fun ride. I've enjoyed my time on the ice and I've enjoyed more and more people getting interested in the game of hockey.

author: Kamisese Mara
quote: The family teaches us about the importance of knowledge, education, hard work and effort. It teaches us about enjoying ourselves, having fun, keeping fit and healthy.

author: Kellan Lutz
quote: I'm really into extreme sports and just having fun.

author: Fabio Lanzoni
quote: Life is short, and you have to have fun with it, you know?

quote: It's always fun to put on bell bottoms and have your butt hanging out and hip huggers.

quote: In any investment, you expect to have fun and make money.

I'm enjoying a forbidden pleasure. And that's fun, and it's funny.

author: Randy Pausch

author: Burt Rutan
quote: We need affordable space travel to inspire our youth, to let them know that they can experience their dreams, can set significant goals and be in a position to lead all of us to future progress in exploration, discovery and fun. Thanks to the X Prize for the inspiration.

author: Peter Tork
quote: Oh, the most fun thing I've ever been asked to autograph was breasts.

author: Chris Eigeman
quote: After my first movie was released, my wife and I went Bouley. A fantastic meal. The whole thing, getting dressed up, acting very adult-y, a lot of fun.

author: Melissa Ordway
quote: In real life, I have mostly gone for nice guys. I definitely had a phase where I was like, "Oh, the bad guy is really cool." It's fun to be bad for a while, and then that ended really terribly - one piece of advice I'll give to people is your mom is always right.

author: Astro

author: Mary-Kate Olsen
quote: I like to go to parties where I know everyone. How are you going to have fun with people you don't know?

author: Harry Styles
quote: I'm an 18-year-old boy, and I'm having fun. I'm just not having as much fun as people make out.

author: Twiggy
quote: Fashion should be stylish and fun.

author: Demba Ba
quote: My former agent introduced me to darts by saying it was a game that would be a lot of fun. He knew I had to concentrate on hitting three 20s or a double or a treble - as this is a target you must achieve. Your mind is focused on accuracy. And it's the same in football, where I must strike the ball just to the right or left of a post.

author: Clint Eastwood
quote: It's much more fun to play something you're nothing like than what you are... It's much easier to hide yourself in a character.

author: Ayushmann Khurrana
quote: Lots of people expect 'Andhadhun' to be a dark film, given it's from Sriram Raghavan. But this film is fun, entertaining, thrilling, and while it has moments of darkness, overall it's not a dark film.

author: Lewis Hamilton
quote: Generally, I hate training - just like most people, I guess. I try to make it fun and varied.

author: Naomi Alderman
quote: The species will continue, whatever apocalypse we manage to unleash. It just won't be much fun to live through.

author: Barbara Corcoran
quote: I built the business exactly the way my mother built and ran her family. I wanted a replication of the big, happy family I grew up in. I wanted happy people having fun.

author: Alain Prost
quote: You want to have fun but you also want to work well. Sometimes I was quite happy at Ferrari, because we would have fun, but then they could not stop having fun and go back to the real work.

author: Joan Cusack
quote: I think just because life is hard, it does seem fun to have a break and laugh about things, so I think in the end, my instincts go there.

author: Kevin O'Leary
quote: I'm starting to think about things that I want to do, things that are fun. One of them is driving a car like a Porsche. I've driven a lot of cars - sedans, trucks and big family vehicles all year long. But there's nothing like a four-wheel-drive Porsche.

author: PewDiePie
quote: Everyone has played video games at some point these days, and video games are fun.

author: Glenn Howerton
quote: I take my work very seriously, and that's the only way for it to be fun for me.

author: Molly Ivins
quote: Keep fighting for freedom and justice, beloveds, but don't forget to have fun doin' it. Lord, let your laughter ring forth. Be outrageous, ridicule the fraidy-cats, rejoice in all the oddities that freedom can produce.

author: V. E. Schwab
quote: I am a firm believer that a good plot makes for a fun enough read, but it's not what binds us. If we don't care about the characters, we won't care - not in a lasting way - about what's happening to them.

author: Vanity
quote: Boy, it is not fun suffering in this body of weak flesh, but Jesus is straightening out all my crooked places.

author: Billy Gardell
quote: Everybody wants to be a better version of themselves - everybody. And I hope one day I can lose some weight. Maybe, who knows, I'll hire myself a trainer and a fancy cook. author: Haylie Duff
quote: The truth is, the reason why a party is fun is because you are enjoying the people you are with. It doest have much to do with the decor or what you wear... It's really just about being with each other and spending special time together.

author: Kaley Cuoco
quote: I did a movie called 'Quicksand No Escape' with Donald Sutherland and Tim Matheson. I think I was maybe 5. I was really little. Yeah, it was fun. And actually, Felicity Huffman played my mom.

author: Rebecca Sugar
quote: I admire 'Adventure Time' for being a piece of art in the way that I think art should be. If you want to see it is poetry, you can, and if you don't, you can watch a fun cartoon.

author: Laurie Holden
quote: It's a fun thing to do: Go to a shooting range with a buddy, knock off a few rounds, release stress.

author: John Cusack
quote: Texas women have an amazing sense of purpose when they lose it. They're the best girls in the world - they're loyal and fun, but when they get mad, they'll try to kill you.

author: Khalid
quote: Once you're comfortable with the way that you're dressing, you express yourself a lot more, and you're just able to have a lot more fun.

author: Bernard Arnault

author: Bill Bailey
quote: If you're going to perform, you're going to attract criticism. You can't please everyone all the time. You don't know how things are going to come out. But that's part of the fun of it, the adventure of doing any kind of art.

author: Bubba Watson
quote: My dad taught me to be a leader or a follower, and he said follower ain't fun. So I want to be the leader of Bubba Watson.

author: Stacey Snider
quote: For 'Fright Night,' we really want to convey the fun attitude of the movie and show the intensity of Colin Farrell as a predator. He's not a brooding vampire - he's dark and dangerous.

author: Julia Stiles
quote: We didn't have a backyard, so as I child, I would turn the coffee table into a stage and put on shows. But it was just a fun thing to do; I never thought about it as a profession. That started as a fluke; my mother had a friend who was an artist with a theater company, and I started going there after school because my mom knew I'd be safe.

author: Kim Cattrall
quote: I did a school play when I was 10 where I played a cold germ infecting a whole classroom of kids. The play was called 'Piffle It's Only a Sniffle.' I'd never had so much fun. It was a thrill.

author: Rob Pike
quote: Go is an attempt to combine the safety and performance of statically typed languages with the convenience and fun of dynamically typed interpretative languages.

author: Freddie Mercury

author: Anna Kendrick
quote: It would be fun to be a redhead... you can get away with being, like, really volatile and fire-y because you're like, 'I'm just a redhead; what can I say?'

author: Joe Biden

author: Johnny Weir
quote: I still have so much passion to perform... That's who Johnny Weir is: I'm a figure skater, I'm an athlete. I want to have fun and enjoy it.

author: Bindi Irwin
quote: We literally live right in the middle of the zoo, and it means that every day is a new experience and so much fun.

author: Alan Moore

Why shouldn't you have a bit of fun while dealing with the deepest issues of the mind?

author: Amor Towles

author: Lea Michele
quote: I'm simple. I love hiking, going to the gym, doing some simple stuff. I love being outdoors, I love bike riding. Just stuff that's fun!

author: Bruce Boxleitner
quote: I had a great run on Babylon 5. It was a lot of fun.

author: Alexandra Daddario

author: Kevin Bacon

author: Elaine Welteroth

author: Mariah Carey

author: Natalie Portman

author: Corbin Bleu

author: Mary Quant
